body.name: Glade Automatic Spray Refill, Air Freshener for Home and Bathroom, Tranquil Lavender & Aloe, 6.2 Oz, 3 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 11 hrs 26 mins
features: Energize your air instantly with Glade Automatic Spray Air Freshener
Enjoy a fresh burst every 9, 18 or 36 min for a timed fragrance release
Self care is in the air with Glade automatic spray with notes of French lavender, soothing aloe, and violet petals
This Glade air freshener fragrance is crafted by master perfumers and infused with Essential Oils
Boost the fragrance of any room with battery operated air freshener
body.description: Sink into serenity with Glade Tranquil Lavender & Aloe Automatic Spray Refill. Self care is in the air with scent diffuser with notes of French lavender, soothing aloe, and violet petals. Glade air freshener fragrance is crafted by master perfumers. Switch things up with automatic air freshener dispenser in Tranquil Lavender & Aloe scent. Open the unit by squeezing the ribs on the side while pulling sides of holder apart. Insert Glade automatic spray refill and choose the time setting to release fragrance. This automatic air freshener spray gives a fresh burst every 9, 18 or 36 minutes. Surround yourself with room freshener fragrance infused with essential oils and turn on soothing fragrance to help you unwind your busy mind.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to use instructions Set it and forget it for up to 60 days of gentle mist at a 36 minute setting. To open the unit squeeze the ribs on the side, while pulling sides of holder apart. Remove the cap from the can and insert the can. Choose a time setting to release fragrance every 9, 18 or 36 minutes or press the 'boost' button anytime for an extra burst of fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Exact Product Type and Quantity are Quite Ambiguous in Descriptions
reviews.reviewText: I will start with saying that I LOVE this fragrance! I could not find it in the automatic spray refills in my local stores. When I searched for "Glade Tranquil Lavender & Aloe automatic refills" on Amazon I found this link. The thing that annoyed me was that the wording in the title of this item is VERY misleading. I was HOPING it was going to be 3 actual refill cans ONLY. (Which...spoiler alert: IT WAS) However the wording suggests that MAYBE you are getting an actual spray holder as well...as in the starter kit. THEN...PLOT TWIST...in the smaller print under the price, it mentions the mysterious entrance of a plug-in! So now we have 3 separate items involved and it clearly says "3 count" in the item title. BUT...what particular items exactly are we REALLY counting?! So I posed the question on the item form, AND reported the misinformation, and then went ahead and ordered it expecting that I would get some sort of starter kit with a single auto spray refill in each one. I further expected that I would then be returning it all. Much to my delighted surprise though, I did receive EXACTLY what I had hoped for... 4 boxes of 3 refill sprays. Just wanted to clarify for future shoppers. It would be awesome if the item description, fine print, and title were all on the same page with one another. I hope that this fragrance will be staying around for a very long time... my favorite auto sprayer fragrances always seem to be from Glade...Blue Odyssey is my other go-to favorite!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this scent!!!
reviews.reviewText: These canisters last a month if you put the sprayer on spray every 30 min.Very soothing scent. I love when i am lying in bed and I hear the 'whoosh'. I know I will have a blast of soothing scent. Keeps my rooms scented with a soft, (not overwhelming) smell. Exceptional deal for the price.Also, you can use the canisters without the timed sprayer. I keep one in each bathroom and use them when I change sheets etc...
